name: Gajar aur Akhrot ka Halwa Recipe | Tahir Chaudhary | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Gajar aur Akhrot ka Halwa Recipe: Carrot (grated) 500 gms Ghee ½ cup Sugar 1 cup Dry Milk ¾ cup Walnuts (chopped) ½ cup Cardamom powder 1 tsp
instructions: Heat ghee add and fry till half is tender. Then add sugar, cardamom, dry milk and cook till sugar dissolve and dries the water. Now add walnuts and cook for few minutes.
